history.proof: intros T F FF D. unfold filter_le. intros P H. qsimpl use: filter_imp. qsimpl use: filter_imp. qsimpl use: filter_and,filter_true,filter_imp. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => D x -> P x).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P0.

In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type P : T -> Prop H : F P H0 : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q Unable to unify "F P" with "within D F P".

In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type P : T -> Prop H : F P H0 : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q H1 : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q Unable to unify "?F (fun x : ?T => ?M2691 x /\\ ?M2692 x)" with "F (fun x : T => D x -> P x)".

original: intros T F FF D. unfold filter_le. intros P H. apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => D x -> P x). - intros x H1. apply H, H1. - apply filter_and; apply filter_true.
